description: REPORT AND RECOMMENDATIONS THAT THE PETITION FOR A WRIT OF HABEAS CORPUS BE DENIED AND DISMISSED. IT IS FURTHER RECOMMENDED THAT A CERTIFICATE OF APPEALABILITY SHOULD NOT ISSUE, AS WE DO NOT BELIEVE THAT PETITIONER HAS DEMONSTRATED THAT REASONABLE JURISTS WOULD FIND EITHER THE CORRECTNESS OF THE PROCEDURAL ASPECTS OF THIS RECOMMENDATION NOR THE VALIDITY OF THE SUBSTANTIVE CLAIMS DEBATABLE.
